name: Happy Glider
description:
### HAPPY GLIDER ###

How far can you fly?

Control your glider with the arrow keys to avoid mines and pick up balloons to go faster! Go for as long as you can!

Developed by Liam Chessell (http://liamchessell.com) for #1GAM (www.onegameamonth.com)

Alternative link at http://liamchessell.com/happyglider/
